name: Super Android X
description:
Eliens have come to conquer Earth.

Someone must save the World.

A doctor made  an android.

He saves the world.

(Defeating enemies, you can level up.)

How to play 

↑↓→←　up,  down,  right,  left

Z   attack (3 combo attack)

↓　＋　Z　under attack

X   dash (During dash, enemies are no damage.)

C  blast (press C  for about 0.5 seconds)

V change flash (Enemy change Pig)

space      jump

Esc     pause 

          continue

           quit  

Or  Xbox controller        gamepad

※Before you press continue button you must touch save point at first.
